meanings.sent1: The maze was the trickliest puzzle I had ever encountered.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her trickliest magic tricks that always amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The trickliest part of the plan was trying to sneak past the guard dog without being noticed.
meanings.sent4: His smile was the trickliest disguise, hiding his true intentions.
meanings.sent5: The trickliest path through the forest was filled with hidden obstacles and surprises.

meanings.sent5: The trickliest room in the house was filled with hidden doors and secret passages.
